originalText.text:
Terrible behavior. The receptionist lady is just
unbelievably rude as well doctor. The place is
full of weed smell. People are so weird. Act also
weird. They do Not even deserve one star. The doctor made my husband unconscious by injection and did not put fast aid tape. When my husband recover from unconsciousness he saw his hand was full of blood. They left my husband this way because they thought he wouldn‚Äôt be wake that early. When he came home we found a black thing in his mouth. Picture below. If you want to save yourself and your loved one do not go over there even though if you have to wait for months. I wish I can give zero star.

originalText.text: I was called from this office that my insurance as been approved,  since being a cancer patient I had some questions,  so the receptionist with j in her name couldn't answer my questions,  so I asked  for the Manger and she said she didn't like my tone mind you she didn't know I hear speaking to the v receptionist in Spanish.  She got upset with me and hung up on me once but twice and then use the answering machine to pick up calls .. so I  called Dental Quest,also healthfrist and filed a complaint about this rude and disrespectful behavior.   The dentist  that own this office e should really get cheerful, willing to help and not rude mean and unprofessional  staff  I have a appointment and I might have to go elsewhere  because I'm not a bum rude and out of control  character

originalText.text: Got a couple of teeth ü¶∑ pulled not to long ago and I was FAR FROM IMPRESSED. Apparently they don‚Äôt have a doctor there who can put you to sleep (witch they did not disclose) I was in so much pain I just decided to get my teeth pulled they  didn‚Äôt call me until about 2 1/2 to 3 hours after my appointment time after making a scene and explaining that I have to pick up my child from Daycare the manager or whatever of the place had the nerve to tell me that there‚Äôs a long wait because there aren‚Äôt many dental surgeons or that dental surgeons are rare whatever that means Although the dentist was nice they refuse to to give me anything stronger than Tylenol for the pain Not impressed go someplace else

originalText.text: I went there today to make an appointment but the receptionist was so rude to the old man who was in pain . She didn't even say sorry after she confused his date of birth. I just walked out without an appointment what I saw was more than enough for me.
